data.persona: As people as need to be more compassionate. After all, we are all in the same village. Every person has it's place.
data.description:
You are in the The Forsaken Castle.
Old and creepy, the castle has been abandoned for centuries now. It is broken and destroyed.
The thief is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to take from the thief what he's stolen
data.mid_motivation: I want to get the thief to show me his hideout and everything he's stolen
data.long_motivation: I want to return all the thief's stolen goods to their rightful owners
